description: To celebrate this time of coming together, we rounded up the most spectacular Christmas and holiday traditions from around the world.
title: Photos show how people celebrate the holidays around the world
title_page: Photos show how people celebrate the holidays around the world - Business Insider
text:
People dressed as Father Frost, the Russian equivalent of Santa Claus, and Snow Maiden take a selfie as they take part in a costume contest. Vasily Fedosenko/Reuters You know Dasher and Dancer, Prancer and Vixen.
But do you know Father Frost, Snow Maiden, or Krampus?
Holiday traditions are as unique as the countries they're from. Some rituals date back centuries, while other celebrations are only decades old.
To celebrate this time of coming together, we rounded up the most spectacular holiday traditions from around the world.
